#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<ctime>
using namespace std;

struct node
{
	int id;
	node *parent;
};

int main()
{
	int N, Q;
	scanf("%d %d", &N, &Q);
	node *nodes[N];
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		nodes[i] = new node();
		nodes[i]->id = i;
	}
	int ad;
	scanf("%d", &ad);
	nodes[ad]->parent = NULL;
	for (int i = 0; i < N-1; i++)
	{
		int x, y;
		scanf("%d %d", &x, &y);
		nodes[y]->parent = nodes[x];
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Q; i++)
	{
		int x, y;
		scanf("%d %d", &x, &y);
		node *n = nodes[x]->parent;
		bool b = false;
		while (n != NULL)
		{
			if (n->id == y)
			{
				printf("1\n");
				b = true;
				break;
			}
			n = n->parent;
		}
		if (b)
			continue;
		n = nodes[y]->parent;
		while (n != NULL)
		{
			if (n->id == x)
			{
				printf("-1\n");
				b = true;
				break;
			}
			n = n->parent;
		}
		if (b)
			continue;
		printf("0\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
